thread.title: New York’s Looming Budget Deadline Quashes Some Holiday Plans

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York’s Looming Budget Deadline Quashes Some Holiday Plans
text:
ALBANY—With the clock ticking, lawmakers were still squabbling Friday afternoon over the state’s $160 billion spending plan.
The impasse is partly over one lawmaker’s request to exempt yeshiva schools from strict state Education Department oversight.
That lawmaker, Sen. Simcha Felder, is a rank-and-file Democratic legislator from Brooklyn,...
